EmailTemplate.subject: Leadership Day with the Army Reserves - TOMORROW!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Contact.Name},
Tomorrow is our 'Learn to be a Leader' event with the Bromley Army Reserves! Here is an overview of what the day will involve:
1. A tour of the Army Barracks which will include artillery and an introduction to the regiment and the role of an Army Reservist.
2. Activities including a group planning exercise, teamwork and initiative tasks, leadership and command tasks, interviews (based around leadership and confidence skills).
3. A talk about life as an Army Reservist and a Q&A session.
This is just a very unique and exciting event where you can learn skills from some of the strongest leaders!
Here is some more information for you:
When: Saturday 9th of July (09:45 - 15:30)
Where: 106 Regiment Royal Artillery, Napier House, Baring Road, Grove Park, London, SE12 0BH.
The nearest train station is Grove Park
We will be ordering Dominoes pizza for lunch (yum yum) - do let me know if you have any dietary requirements.
If you require expenses for your travel to be reimbursed please bring a copy of your receipt on the day with you.
If you have any questions do give me a call on 07876836445.
I look forward to seeing you,
Rhiannon
Graduate Associate Manager 07876836445
